android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.description: Allows the application to read all the URLs that the browser has visited and all of the browser's bookmarks.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify the sync settings, such as whether sync is enabled for Contacts.

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to use the account authenticator capabilities of the Account Manager, including creating accounts as well as obtaining and setting their passwords.

android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to read the sync settings, such as whether sync is enabled for Contacts.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.NFC.description: Allows an application to communicate with Near-Field Communication (NFC) tags, cards and readers.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_.description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

com.huawei.android.launcher.permission.W.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.oppo.launcher.permission.WRITE_SETTI.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.description: Allows the application to control the flashlight.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.GET_TASKS.description: Allows application to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.

android.permission.REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKA.info: Allows an application to request installing packages.
android.permission.REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKA.description: Malicious applications can use this to try and trick users into installing additional malicious packages.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Service (com.opera.android.firebase.OperaFirebaseMessagingService) is not Protected.
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected. [android:exported=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.opera.android.startup.NewsStartActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title: TaskAffinity is set for Activity </br>(com.opera.android.gcm.PushPopupActivity)
manifest_analysis.desc: If taskAffinity is set, then other application could read the Intents sent to Activities belonging to another task. Always use the default setting keeping the affinity as the package name in order to prevent sensitive information inside sent or received Intents from being read by another application.
manifest_analysis.name: TaskAffinity is set for Activity

manifest_analysis.title:
Service (com.evernote.android.job.gcm.PlatformGcmService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: com.google.android.gms.permission.BIND_NETWORK_TASK_SERVICE
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

playstore_details.title: Opera News - Trending news and videos
playstore_details.description:
Premier League is back! ⚽ Follow your favourite club and keep up to speed with the latest match updates and live scores with Opera News.  Packed with the latest football news, videos, fixtures, and stats! Opera News is a completely personalised news app that lets you follow trending topics, stay on top of the latest football developments, watch and share entertainment videos, and keep current with local and global news, all in one app! 
Features: 
• Top news: 
Read the latest and most popular news articles on entertainment, economy, finance, business, technology, science, sports, travel, fashion, and politics - all delivered by top global and national media outlets.

• Personalised news: 
Powered by our most powerful AI news engine, Opera News delivers real-time, AI-curated content according to your interests. Follow your favourite channels to see topics personalised just for you. The more you use the app, the better it becomes. Your preferences and personal information are kept completely secure; Opera News will never share your private data with anyone.

• Instaclips: 
Instaclips collects the latest trending videos for you to enjoy. Upload video clips from any website and share them with Instaclips. This is a collection of the latest entertaining and viral videos for you to enjoy and share with friends.

• Follow your favourite football team: 
Stay on top of the latest football news with access to all international competitions including Premier League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, Ligue 1! Subscribe for updates on your favourite clubs and get live scores and commentary. 

• Search news: 
Want to know what the latest trending searches are? Want to find news about a specific topic or person? Opera News now features a search bar that gives you suggestions on top trending searches and lets you search for specific topics or people to read about or follow.

• My interest graph:
You can get personalised topic recommendations based on what you have followed and by adding personal preferences, so when you open the app you see only what is relevant to you.

• News push notification: 
Receive important breaking news alerts directly on your home screen. Always stay updated about what is happening around you.

• Data savings 
Save up to 80% of your mobile data with our unique turbo engine.

• Offline reading: 
Save news stories to your phone while connected to Wi-Fi and read them later offline without using data.

• Save your favourites: 
Bookmark good finds and save articles to read later - even when offline!

Twitter – http://twitter.com/opera/
Facebook – http://www.facebook.com/opera/
Instagram – http://www.instagram.com/opera

Terms & Conditions:
By downloading this application, you are agreeing to the End User Licence Agreement at https://www.opera.com/eula/mobile. Also, you can learn how Opera handles and protects your data in our Privacy Statement at https://www.opera.com/privacy.
playstore_details.summary: Premier League updates, football, entertainment videos, and local & global news.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Premier League updates, football, entertainment videos, and local & global news.
playstore_details.recentChanges:
Follow trending topics, entertainment videos & personalized news with our fast data-saving news app, and even with a search bar now: 
★ Ranked as the number 1 news and video app in many markets.
★ Instaclips lets you share and view trending video clips from any site.
★ Interest graph: get personal recommendation of topics to customize your news feed.
★ Minimized download size, less than 11 MB.
★ Save data and store articles offline to read while you’re not connected.
